article:
Harry likes driving his car very fast, and one day he hit  another car. He jumped out and ran to it. There was an old man in the car. He was very angry and said to Harry." What were you doing? You nearly killed me!"
"Yes," Harry answered," I am very sorry." He took a bottle  out of his car and said, "Drink some of this. Then you will feel better." He gave the old man some whisky  and the man drank it, but then he shouted again, "You nearly killed me!" Harry gave him the bottle again. "I feel much better now. But why aren't you drinking?"
"Oh, well," said Harry, " I don't want any whisky now. I am going to sit here to wait for the police."
